name: Wobbling Simulator (LETS GO ARMY WOOO)
description:
HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT ABOUT HOW AWESOME WOBBLING IS?!? I LOVE IT!! IT REQUIRES SO MUCH SKILL AND MY FAVORITE WOBBLER IS ARMY <3!!!!! PICK YOUR OWN WOBBLING STYLE!!! LETS GO ARMY WOOO!!! Immerse yourself in this very realistic experience of a common low level wobbler going through his day. (Note: This is a text based game.)

10/10, very immersive, perfectly realistic - The developer himself
